p: Applications of different doses of O. basilicum and C. winterianus over beans repelled A. obtectus attack, significantly reducing the number of beans affected (beans damaged) by the insects after treatment with O. basilicum (F = 13.29; df = 5.18; p < 0.0001) and C. winterianus (F = 5.93; df = 5.18; p = 0.002) essential oils ( Table 1).
